summary: An insurance company investigator goes to a small town to probe into a case of supposed suicide. The natives are not very cooperative and some turn hostile, leading to suspicion of foul play.
cast: William Bendix|Dennis O'Keefe|Barbara Britton|Art Baker|Ann E. Todd|Doro Merande|Virginia Christine|Helen Spring|Ruth Lee|Henry Hall|Russell Arms|Dan White|Paul E. Burns|Emmett Vogan|Jamesson Shade|Jack Lee|Hank Worden|George McDonald|Ivan Bell|Franklyn Farnum|Ben Hall|Jeffrey Sayre|Bert Stevens
title: Cover Up
